full_text: sheby Notary, - 2 - FOIA (b) (6) FOIA (b)(6) and we all except the said married daughter Vimal are members of the joint undivided Hindu family. My salary is Rs.333.50 per month, which is not sufficient to meet with the rising costs of living. 2. My said son, Suresh Purushottam Tendulkar presently employed as a Scientific Officer at British Welding Research Association, Cambridge, U.K. is assisting me in maintaining and educating my two children Pramod FOIA (b) )(6) and by monthly remittance through bank. 3. I, Smt. Rukminibai Purushottam Tendulkar, for myself say that I am 58 years of age and am doing household work and I have no income. 4. I, Kum. Sharayu Purushottam Tendulkar for myself say that I am 28 years of age. My date of birth being 6th March,1 1939 as mentioned in the School Leaving Certificate, copy whereof is hereto annexed and marked Ex. "B". I am a Bachelor of Arts of the Bombay University presently employed at Maharashtra Housing Board. My monthly salary is Rs.200/- I reside with my parents in a joint family and I am unmarried. My income is hardly enough to meet my personal expenses.
